name: One Button Peggle
description:
One Button Peggle is an arcade game based off Peggle, except it only uses one button.

HOW TO PLAY: Press any button to shoot a ball. To get points you have to hit pegs, bouncy blocks or you can explode the ball by making it go too fast or getting it stuck. if you hit the green rectangle at the bottom of the levels you get an extra ball. If you run out of balls you lose.

Made for the One Button Game Jam 2020
